name: asposecloudsdk
summary: This SDK allows you to work with Aspose REST APIs in your iOS applications quickly and easily.
description: Aspose for Cloud is a cloud-based document generation, conversion and automation platform for developers. Aspose for Cloudâ€™s REST APIs give developers total control over documents and file formats. It interoperates seamlessly with other cloud services. Aspose for Cloud makes it easy for iOS developers to work with Microsoft Word documents, Microsoft Excel spreadsheets, Microsoft PowerPoint presentations, Adobe PDFs, OpenDocument formats, barcodes, OCR and email formats and protocols in their apps.
